column3: The issue that this PR solves was introduced in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6722\n

Usually projects have some convention for this (eg _XX and XX, or XX_nolock and XX) . Where one is used internally (when lock already held) and the other externally (locks and calls inner function). \nPreferable to have the names as similar as possible with just the lock/nonlock difference. `lockAndClear` and `clearSync` are too far apart to be easily recognizable as a set. So IMO the current nami
:+1: just not something I'd seen before. \n
